Plot: The deadly T-Virus plagues Raccoon City with zombies and monsters of all kinds. Survive the scenarios, uncover the T-Virus outbreak, dig deep into Umbrella's secrets, and escape Raccoon ...
Title: Resident Evil: Outbreak
Writer: Noritaka Funamizu (scenario director: Decisions,  Decisions), Noritaka Funamizu (scenario director: Outbreak), Yasunori Ichinose (scenario director: Hellfire), Yuji Matsumoto (scenario director: The Hive), Koichi Okada (scenario director: Below Freezing Point)
Actors: Kenroy Allen, Vittorio Altomare, Harbir Anand, Perdita Andrews
